resources.string: Google Codelabs provide a guided, tutorial, hands-on coding experience. Most codelabs will step you through the process of building a small application, or adding a new feature to an existing application.
Gorillas are ground-dwelling, predominantly herbivorous apes that inhabit the forests of central Africa.

Pervasive Health Conference is a premier international forum with specific focus on technologies and human factors related to the use of ubiquitous computing in healthcare and wellbeing. The overall goal of Pervasive Health Conference is to take a multidisciplinary approach to Pervasive Healthcare Technology research and development.
